title: Is there a game today?
description: This collection of sites started as a simple project to make 'Are the Giants playing today'. It was meant to tell me just that, are the Giants playing today? Last year I decided to spread the love and clone the site a few times, out of it came this little project which grows as I tinker with it.

title: JRule
description: JRule is a bookmarklet powered set of tools focused around measuring things on web pages.
